pullRequest.title: Support to use empty string to override existing config.
pullRequest.bodyText:
Resolves #4613
This PR fixed an override bug. When the default value is not empty string, but the user want to override it with empty value, it is always failure. Report from #4613 (comment) by @lianghuiyuan
Also, fixing 3 things.

Wrong system env names, duplicated SW_.
trustStorePath should not have default path in the official distribution YAML.
TTL config in the ElasticSearch providers have not been deleted by my previous PR.

@hanahmily @innerpeacez The env name changes don't require change at helm side, right?

commit.message: Support to use empty string to override existing config.
